Name: macinabox
Overview: Downloads and installs a macOS VM. Either Monterey, Big Sur, Catalina, Mojave or High Sierra. It will download the install media from Apple servers and convert it to a usable format for use for a VM. It can fully autoinstall a macOS VM on the server. Also it can prepare all files ready for a manual install if you prefer. Tools are also provided to fix the xml when the custom xml has been stripped out of the VM after its been edited by the Unraid VM manager.
Requires:
Usercripts plugin
vm_custom_icons (0ptional for the correct icons for macOS)

installtype.Name: Install Type
installtype.Description: Auto install to install a vm directly into Unraid. Manual for advanced install

vdisksize.Name: Vdisk Size
vdisksize.Description: Enter desired vdisk size (only used by auto install - ignored by manual install)

vdisktype.Name: Vdisk Type
vdisktype.Description: Choose vdisk type  raw or qcow2  (qcow2 takes less space)

opencorestockorcustom.Name: Opencore stock or custom
opencorestockorcustom.Description: Choose from the built in Opencore in macinabox or choose a custom one (add in appdata/macinabox/custom_opencore)

overridedefualtnictype.Name: Override defualt NIC type
overridedefualtnictype.Description:
Defualt is no
Change to override the template defualt for the NIC

vmimageslocationagain!!!.Name: VM Images Location AGAIN !!!
vmimageslocationagain!!!.Description: This must match the above VM Images Location (yes we need it twice!)

isossharelocationagain!!!.Name: Isos Share Location AGAIN !!!
isossharelocationagain!!!.Description: This must match the above Isos Share Location (yes we need it twice!)

injectmacinaboxhelperscripts.Name: Inject Macinabox helper scripts
injectmacinaboxhelperscripts.Description: Injects macinabox helper userscript directly into userscripts plugin

vmimageslocation.Name: VM Images Location
vmimageslocation.Description: Select where your vm images are stored on the server - defualt location is /mnt/user/domains/

isossharelocation.Name: Isos Share Location
isossharelocation.Description: Your isos share path - macOS install media will be put here.  defualt location is  /mnt/user/isos/

appdata.Name: appdata
appdata.Description: Appdata location. If you change this you will need to do the same in the macinabox help user script
